name: Jonathan Baker
text: Continued top-tier service from Michael from Pizza Hut Mt. Washington! Always professional cheerful and smiling!

name: Stephanie Wells
text: Disappointing, these are my honey bbq wings, extra sauce...and you cant talk to anyone and no one cares about your experience so go in knowing they don't care if they get it wrong...

name: Jason Sebastian
text: Best pizza I've ever had, and the manager was very helpful. Best ran pizza hut I've ever seen!!

name: YOUNG REED
text: fast service.  foods hot.  it's pizza hut.  so same as the next one or it  should be.  nothing to report on service or quality of food.  say it again it's pizza hut, you like it or you don't.  if you do than you know what your getting.

name: Tracy Phillips
text: Worst experience ever. When the pizza arrived over 20 minutes late the seal on my pizza was broken it looked as if someone had been in it, that is disscusting on a normal day but durring a pandemic pretty rediculious. I have tried calling 6 â€¦More

name: R Webb
text: Great food, nice customer service. Extremely hard to reach on the phone if needed, and pricing could be a little better or at least more deals with discounts. Overall pretty great!

name: Joseph Pevlor
text: With only 1 person working the oven I was able to get my order in 17 minutes that's awesome

name: Madden Powell
text: I had an awesome time in this restaurant. We liked the first-rate vibes and the meals. The staff members are super amiable. I am content we finally decided to visit here.

name: Shannon Keen
text: Manager and staff was super busy but remained professional. Staff is friendly and welcoming.

name: Larry Tucker
text: Still one of America's favorites after all these years.

name: Megan Tazelaar hi on our
text: Pizza was pretty good but they forgot our dipping sauce that i paid extra for, they told us that it was in there and it wasn't, called to let them know and the guy said well that's a bummer. Not very polite, and they didn't put pepperoni on â€¦More

name: elizabeth mcdonald
text: The past 3 times I have ordered from this store it has taken an hour or more to get our.  The pizza is almost cold and looks like it has been slammed around in the box.  We literally watched the driver who delivered our food last night â€¦More

name: William Fleitz
text: What a joke tried to order online but every time I checked out it was deleted I called the guy wanted to argue with me took 15 min for him to tell me I have to order online after I told him I tried already then he wanted to transfer me

name: Michael Stoll
text: Ordered 4 large pizzas thin crust, picked them up and they said they had to make them all  pan crust, they were out of thin crust( how does a pizza place run out of crust?) got home and one of the pizzas was missing a topping.

name: Julie Augenstein
text: Horrible!! Pizza was wrong! I spent a lot of money on my order! I'm very unhappy! Also you cant talk to no one anymore.  It's customer service now. They never helped us! What's worse is when they transferred me to management didn't answer! I kept getting hung up on. I will never order PIZZA HUT again!!

name: Jeremy Holt
text: Very good I suggest picking it up and seeing the team there. They all seemed very helpful and happy.

name: Danielle Nelson
text: Delivery took way to long plus forgot all the extra sauces i paid for and of course try to call they wont let you speak to a manger. Its not hard people read the order include all the items...... Wont be ordering from here again

name: Gerald Harbolt Jr
text: My wings an pizza was so good an a nice clean store an staff were great

name: chan king
text:
The staff is always amazing here. My orders are always faster than the estimation, and the staff is always friendly and talkative.
It could stand to be a little cleaner, though.

name: Brandon Kratz
text: Over priced,  cold pizza. Wings were cooked about 8 hours earlier. 7 employees and not a single one seemed to know what they were supposed to do.  Bad service,  bad food. Save your time and money.

name: Maranda Littlejohn
text: Follow up to my previous review - when the pizza FINALLY arrived, almost 2 hours later, it was cold to the touch. Delivery driver was nice enough but tried to tell us how other peopleâ€™s orders were even worse off than ours, which seems a silly thing to stay. On top of all of it, not only were we NOT refunded, we were double-charged.

name: Armani Crawford
text: I love how clean thee place is, great pizza as expected from Pizza Hut.

name: Adam Patterson
text: Waited for my pizza for over an hour and then called to get a status. I was told my pizza is not in the store and is out for delivery. I waited 30 more minutes and called back, this time they didnâ€™t answer. I tried multiple times and the â€¦More

name: Michele Roach
text: Pizza was cold..the delivery driver was incompetent..and the manager is a liar...she said she would credit my account for the LATE cold pizza that I received but she didnt..this place SUCKS!!!

name: Deb Kerpen
text:
On time and hot on a Friday night. Best pizza yet.
Give them another chance!!! Next time it was a total different story sorry!

name: Theresa Holmes
text: Clearly the owner of the Mt. Washington location has zero management skills. Problems with every order.

name: Mark Ostbloom
text: The pizzas have really gone downhill in the last 6 months. We got a pizza from there the other day and it seemed like most of it was crossed with very little sauce or toppings. Very disappointed in the condition of the place compared to â€¦More

name: Jennifer Best
text: Absolutely great pic since new mgr. Best pizza Hut ever now

name: Aaron Sands
text: Great place to eat I get a LG pan pepperoni extra cheese pizza every Sunday and almost devour it alone

name: Tabitha Leanne
text: Asked for light sauce extra cheese pizza and my pizza was caked in sauce with light cheese only in the middle and boneless wings, they said they would replace it and the replacement was still saucy as hell and got wings with bones in them.

name: debbie brown
text: We ordered honey bbq wings,  there was almost some sauce in the container,  none on the wings,  the buffalo wings were fine,  but the pizza,  which was supposed to b extra cheese,  barely had cheese on it.

name: Brad Reading
text: Pizza was pretty good. Price was fair. Service was good.

name: Jeffrey Smith
text: Best pizza in town, great service with a smile ðŸ˜Ž

name: wendy crockett
text: Waited two hour for delivery.had to go retrieve my order.not happy.but they were understaffed

name: Mary Leitner
text: Waited over an hour for 25 minute pasta.  Place was a disaster.

name: Hope Jones
text: The lady who took my order was very helpful and helped me make a decision with what little money I had she took the time to help me get the most food for my money...very kind and had a lot of patience with me and my situation. â€¦More

name: Angela Watts
text: Clean, friendly, average price, good food

name: Stephanie Wells
text: Don't order from this place its always late and they never answer the phone

name: Chris Krempp
text: Said my pizza would be delivered in about 25-35 minutes it took over an hour which is no big deal. The delivery man got to my door and says "wait a few minutes before you open your soda I dropped it." Then I open my pizza and it looked like â€¦More

name: Barbara Constant
text: Very good food and service! Very clean!

name: Austin Carver
text: Fantastic service and help from Brandon for my grandmother.

name: Teresa Smith
text: Friendly, and quick service. Great job guys!

name: Missy Macauley
text: The Guy at The Counter Was Very Friendly. It's Not A Best Choice for Larger Groups  because it's smaller than most Pizza Hits that I Have Visited. My Order Was Fast, Hot & Delicious ~!!! The Location was convenient for me.ðŸ¤—ðŸ˜Ž Btw, I noticed they Do Have Delivery and Wi~Fi ðŸŒžðŸŒž

name: Kindle Bohannon
text: Great service. Great food. Great prices.

name: Colleen Geary
text: Worst pizza I've ever had !iPathitic ! Worst money I've ever spent. Won't order from them again !

name: T M
text: Ordered pizza for pickup at 4:00.  Said it would be ready in 15 minutes.  When I get there at 4:20, they had not even started.  There were only two workers there and they had no sense of urgency.  When another person arrived, the individual â€¦More

name: Stacey Hartlage
text: Pizza is always great!

name: Abby Guy
text: Patrick took my order and he was friendly as can be! Great Guy, he deserves a raise!

name: Dwight Kitterman
text: Very poor management. Had to argue with Manger Steven to reimburse us after getting the wrong order then had to wait 1hr an half b4 we decide to just take food back. Very dissatisfied. Even a work there said he was not willing to work with customers

name: Dana Dykes
text:
I just had the best vegetable lovers  pizza I've ever had from Mr. Washington  pizza hut.   Thank
you!

name: Mechelle Gregory
text: Great food and great service.

name: big georgiarebel
text: Would rate higher if the place was cleaner. Hopefully they get it cleaned up... I miss pizza hut

name: Mack Hrebicik
text: I liked the great pizza. Patrick was great.

name: Premium Motor Sales
text: Save your time and patients and go somewhere else

name: kid cam
text: Great pizza joint

name: Maranda Littlejohn
text: Slow and rude. Ordered pizza at 5:30 on a Thursday and at 7:15 still no sign of it and no one will answer the phone. When we get corporate, they just tell us to wait and call the store. The phone just rings off the hook.

name: Stephen Watts
text: Place was clean, staff was friendly and as far as the food goes. It's just like their commercial, No one out pizzas the Hut.

name: Alan Strevinsky
text: Busy all the time

name: Stephen Loftus
text: Hook it up

text: Terrible

name: Patrick Flaherty
text: THE BEST PIZZA PLACE EVER!!!!!!!!!!!! I LOVE PIZZA HUT! I WILL NEVER EAT PIZZA ANYWHERE ELSE!

text: Regular prices nothing special

name: Susan Smith

text: Waited an HOUR for my pizza and wings yesterday- at the store- Carryout...

text: When pizza arrived it was cold, needed to be heated before eating.

name: jonathan Williamson
text: Not bad. Busy

name: Geri Helm
